@@ -0,0 +1,172 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<ScrollView
+    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:id="@+id/scrollView2"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:padding="40dp">
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/event_name"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="29dp"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="28dp"
+            android:ems="10"
+            android:hint="@string/event_create_hint_name"
+            android:inputType="text"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_description"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.5"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/event_description"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
+            android:ems="10"
+            android:gravity="start|top"
+            android:hint="@string/event_create_hint_description"
+            android:inputType="textMultiLine"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/imageView2"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.5"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_name" />
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/event_address"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="14dp"
+            android:ems="10"
+            android:hint="@string/event_create_hint_postaladdress_"
+            android:inputType="textPostalAddress"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_price"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.457"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_create_display_date" />
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/event_price"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"
+            android:ems="10"
+            android:hint="@string/event_create_hint_price"
+            android:inputType="number"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_website"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.487"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_address" />
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/event_website"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"
+            android:ems="10"
+            android:hint="@string/event_create_hint_website"
+            android:inputType="textUri"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_creation_spinner"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.477"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_price" />
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/event_phone_contact"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="14dp"
+            android:ems="10"
+            android:hint="@string/event_create_hint_phone"
+            android:inputType="phone"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_email_contact"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.497"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_creation_spinner" />
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/event_email_contact"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="19dp"
+            android:ems="10"
+            android:hint="@string/event_create_hint_emailaddress"
+            android:inputType="textEmailAddress"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_create_button"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.497"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_phone_contact" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/event_create_button"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="40dp"
+            android:text="@string/default_validate_button"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.5"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_email_contact" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/event_create_display_time"
+            android:layout_width="251dp"
+            android:layout_height="50dp"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="9dp"
+            android:text="@string/event_create_display_time"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_create_display_date"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.5"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/imageView2" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/event_create_display_date"
+            android:layout_width="251dp"
+            android:layout_height="50dp"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
+            android:text="@string/event_create_display_date"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_address"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_create_display_time" />
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:id="@+id/imageView2"
+            android:layout_width="200dp"
+            android:layout_height="50dp"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="11dp"
+            android:src="@drawable/blobfish"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_create_display_time"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.5"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_description" />
+
+        <Spinner
+            android:id="@+id/event_creation_spinner"
+            android:layout_width="251dp"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"
+            app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/event_phone_contact"
+            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/event_website" />
+    </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
+</ScrollView>

@@ -25,16 +25,25 @@
         android:layout_width="150dp"
         android:layout_height="40dp"
         android:layout_marginLeft="90dp"
-        android:layout_marginTop="200dp"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="204dp"
         android:text="FeedView"
         android:textColor="@android:color/background_dark"
         android:textSize="15sp"
         android:textStyle="bold"
         app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
         app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.226"
-        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.056" />
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.325"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/create_event_button"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginTop="35dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="28dp"
+        android:text="@string/create_event_button"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/feed_view_button"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/feed_view_button" />
 
     <Button
         android:id="@+id/eventButton"

@@ -17,4 +17,22 @@
     values-round/strings.xml for round devices.
     -->
     <string name="hello_world">Hello Square World!</string>
+    <string name="event_name">Event Name</string>
+    <string name="default_event_name">Event Name</string>
+    <string name="default_event_description">Event Description</string>
+    <string name="default_validate_button">Validate Selection</string>
+    <string name="default_select_event_date">Select Event Date</string>
+    <string name="create_event_button">Create Event</string>
+    <string name="title_event_creation" />
+    <string name="event_create_display_dat" />
+    <string name="event_create_display_date">Date</string>
+    <string name="event_create_time_button">Select Event Time</string>
+    <string name="event_create_display_time">Time</string>
+    <string name="event_create_hint_name">Event Name</string>
+    <string name="event_create_hint_description">Event Description</string>
+    <string name="event_create_hint_phone">Contact Phone</string>
+    <string name="event_create_hint_postaladdress_">Event Address</string>
+    <string name="event_create_hint_emailaddress">Contact Email</string>
+    <string name="event_create_hint_price">Event Price</string>
+    <string name="event_create_hint_website">Event Website</string>
 </resources>
